data.lyric:
[ti:Shallow]
[ar:Lady Gaga/Bradley Cooper]
[al:Shallow]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Shallow - Lady Gaga/Bradley Cooper
[00:00.37]Produced by：Lady Gaga/Benjamin Rice
[00:00.74]Bradley Cooper：
[00:15.99]Tell me something girl
[00:20.95]Are you happy in this modern world
[00:25.79]Or do you need more
[00:30.90]Is there something else you're searching for
[00:35.42]I'm falling
[00:40.47]In all the good times I find myself longing for change
[00:50.53]And in the bad times I fear myself
[00:54.72]Lady Gaga：
[01:05.92]Tell me something boy
[01:10.83]Aren't you tired trying to fill that void
[01:15.79]Or do you need more
[01:20.76]Ain't it hard keeping it so hardcore
[01:25.28]I'm falling
[01:30.68]In all the good times I find myself longing for change
[01:40.46]And in the bad times I fear myself
[01:45.26]I'm off the deep end watch as I dive in
[01:50.28]I'll never meet the ground
[01:55.15]Crash through the surface where they can't hurt us
[01:59.92]We're far from the shallow now
[02:04.37]Both：
[02:05.83]In the shallow shallow
[02:10.93]In the shallow shallow
[02:15.87]In the shallow shallow
[02:20.00]We're far from the shallow now
[02:24.44]Lady Gaga：
[02:27.79]Wooaaaah
[02:32.47]Woaaaaaaaaaaah
[02:45.25]I'm off the deep end watch as I dive in
[02:50.15]I'll never meet the ground
[02:55.16]Crash through the surface where they can't hurt us
[02:59.87]We're far from the shallow now
[03:03.84]Both：
[03:05.87]In the shallow shallow
[03:10.82]In the shallow shallow
[03:15.83]In the shallow shallow
[03:19.83]We're far from the shallow now
data.trans:
[ti:Shallow]
[ar:Lady Gaga/Bradley Cooper]
[al:Shallow]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.37]//
[00:00.74]//
[00:15.99]女孩 跟我说说吧
[00:20.95]在这摩登世界里你过得是否开心
[00:25.79]或者你渴望更多
[00:30.90]是否有你正不懈追寻的梦呢
[00:35.42]我慢慢沦陷
[00:40.47]陷入找寻自我 寻求改变的快乐时光里
[00:50.53]还有我畏惧面对自我的伤心时刻中
[00:54.72]//
[01:05.92]男孩 跟我说说吧
[01:10.83]你难道不曾厌倦自己竭力去填满空虚
[01:15.79]或者你渴望更多
[01:20.76]难道一直坚强不难么
[01:25.28]我慢慢沦陷
[01:30.68]陷入找寻自我 寻求改变的快乐时光里
[01:40.46]还有我畏惧面对自我的伤心时刻中
[01:45.26]我逃离这深渊绝境 看起来好像我沦陷其中
[01:50.28]我永远都无法触及地面吧
[01:55.15]冲出那地狱深渊 怎会让它们伤害我们分毫
[01:59.92]此刻我们已远离那搁浅的浅滩
[02:04.37]//
[02:05.83]搁浅的浅滩
[02:10.93]搁浅的浅滩
[02:15.87]搁浅的浅滩
[02:20.00]此刻我们已远离那搁浅的浅滩
[02:24.44]//
[02:27.79]//
[02:32.47]//
[02:45.25]我逃离这深渊绝境 看起来好像我沦陷其中
[02:50.15]我永远都无法触及地面吧
[02:55.16]冲出那地狱深渊 怎会让它们伤害我们分毫
[02:59.87]此刻我们已远离那搁浅的浅滩
[03:03.84]//
[03:05.87]搁浅的浅滩
[03:10.82]搁浅的浅滩
[03:15.83]搁浅的浅滩
[03:19.83]此刻我们已远离那搁浅的浅滩
